assets.description: Click 3X Editor Jeremy Baumann edited this spot.
assets.title: Jeremy Baumann Editor

assets.description: Since arriving at Click 3X in early 2010, Editor Jeremy Baumann has cut spots for LEGO, MTV, EPIX, Cablevision, Hasbro's Furry Frenzies as well as editing a TV series for Comedian, Dave Attell.  Jeremy is currently cutting all of the footage for the second season, which will premiere in September.
assets.title: Jeremy Baumann Editor

assets.description: Only one network showcases boxing of EPIX proportions and we recently helped them spread the word that there is a new home for boxing on cable.  Premium cable network EPIX is hoping to restore an old tradition, as well as make a name for itself as a future player in the boxing industry.  To do so, we launched a new image campaign that highlighted the fights that EPIX has aired in 2011 as well as shared the news of where to turn for the best and brightest in boxing's future.
assets.title: Jeremy Baumann Editor

assets.description: We shot all of the live action footage on location.  It was then edited here with audio mixing handled by Sounds Like Click.
